commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Everyone's so late...

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: I'm sure they'll be here soon, but...let's head back for now and get ready.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: *Huff* *Huff* I've finally found you, Lili!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Yoshiko! And everyone!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: I've... I've been DYING to see you!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Eek! Yoshiko?!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Lili! You can't go starting your recital without me around, okay?!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Y-You're choking me, Yoshiko! Did something happen to you guys?

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Anyway, I knew you'd be here so I was waiting for you. I'm so glad you made it.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: All's well that ends well, right, Yoshiko?

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: You're really late. I was worried sick.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: I'm sorry. We were planning on getting here sooner, but...

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: *Chuckle* Don't be. I'm not mad or anything. Thanks for coming.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: A certain somebody was on the side of the road crying about never being able to see her precious Lili again.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Huh?!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Don't you dare! I wiped my eyes and left those tears behind in the labyrinth of the magic metropolis!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: The show is about to start soon, so we're gonna go wait in our seats.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Sure. And you don't have to yell or anything, but...I hope you'll be cheering us on.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: This is amazing... It's a packed house.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I could've held a live show here for everyone if it weren't for Riko and Maki's recital.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: *Chuckle* We can keep that in mind for later.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: The performance is starting soon. Let's cheer them on in our hearts so that their recital is a big success from start to finish!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: I'm so glad everyone made it here. Aren't you, Maki?

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Yeah...

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Um, Maki?

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Oh, sorry! I think my nerves kind of got the better of me.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Wow, so you actually get nervous too...

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Wh-What, you think I wouldn't?!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Besides, this is supposed to be your recital anyway. Nobody's really here to see me.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: You know, there was once a time that I was so anxious, I couldn't even play piano anymore.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: So, what'd you do to get over that?

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Chika and all of my friends were there for me. It was thanks to them always being there for me that I was able to play again.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: You're right. I have so many people who are always there for me too... Including you, Riko.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Maki...

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: I'm glad I got the chance to practice with you, even if it was only for a little bit. Let's put on an amazing performance and show everyone just how hard we practiced.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Yeah. Let's put on our own special piano four-hands recital!
